content:
Here is the total of all your gift spending across all stores:

**Total Gift Spending:** $1,219

This includes all the gifts you've mentioned so far:

* $250 at Tiffany's for your sister's birthday gift
* $849 at Best Buy for your dad's Father's Day gift
* $120 at Williams-Sonoma for your friend's housewarming gift

Let me know if you have any other purchases or gifts you'd like to add to the list!
